definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
(TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm

sentences.english: It is indicated that childhood asthma should be treated through phlegm and blood-stasis.
sentences.chinese: 小儿哮喘应从痰瘀论治，以化痰通瘀为治则。

sentences.english: To explore the clinical treatment efficacy and generalization meaning that the usage of Qingfei Huatan decoction.
sentences.chinese: 探讨清肺化痰方在治疗该病的临床价值及推广意义。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic efficacy of qi-descending and phlegm-resolving therapy for non-erosive gastroesophageal reflux disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察降气化痰法治疗非糜烂性食管病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: It is indicated that childhood asthma should he treated through phlegm and blood-stasis.
sentences.chinese: 小儿哮喘应从痰瘀论治，以化痰通瘀为治则。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Shegan Mixture" is effective in treating childhood cough.
sentences.chinese: 结论射干合剂治疗小儿咳嗽优于小儿止咳化痰糖浆。

sentences.english: Treatment for liver cancer mainly by drying dampness and resolving phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 治疗肝癌以燥湿化痰为主进行辨证论治。

sentences.english: Licorice has been used for centuries as an expectorant to loosen phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 甘草用于化痰已有几个世纪了。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Yishen Huatan Decoction " is quiet effective for polycystic ovary syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 结论益肾化痰法治疗多囊卵巢综合征有较好疗效。

sentences.english: Animal experiment was adapted to research the pharmacology effects of Zhisou-Huatan tablet.
sentences.chinese: 采用动物实验对止咳化痰丸进行药理学研究。

sentences.english: No matter what kind of cough, phlegm all should.
sentences.chinese: 无论是什么样的咳嗽，都是应该先化痰。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-inflammatory and immunity effects of Huatan Jiangqi capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察化痰降气胶囊的抗炎免疫作用。

definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
(TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
to invigorate blood circulation and alleviate pain (idiom)
to benefit the stomach and increase fluids (idiom)
